definitions.body: briers (so Vrss Ki al., also Stu q.v., Be, √ unknown; cf. ‖[[קוֹחִים]]; > J. D. Michaelis, Thes al. threshing-sledges, furnished with sharp (glittering) stones) Ju Jdg 8:7 [[וְדַשְׁתִּ֫י]] ´[[אֶת־בְּשַׂרְכֶם אֶת־קוֹחֵי הַמִּדְבָּר וְאֶת־הַבּ]] (vid. also [[דושׁ]])  and I will thresh your flesh together with the thorns of the wilderness and the briers; v:Jdg 8:16 [[וַיּׁדַע]] ´[[וַיִּקַּח אֶת־זִקְנֵי הָעִיר וְאֶת־קוֹחֵי הַמִּדְבָּר וְאֶת הַבּ]] [[בָּהֶם אֵת אַנְשֵׁי סֻכּוֹת]] (rd. [[וַיׇּדָשׁ]] for [[וַיּׁדַע]] LXX Bu:RS 114; cf. Stu Be) and he took the thorns of the wilderness and the briers and threshed, etc.
